ISSUE.TITLE: nightscout.appcache makes changes to index.html very hard
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: @brianhanifin I'm thinking about pulling nightscout.appcache out. I really had to fight chrome to get rid of it yesterday, and I don't think we need it for the mp3's.
